      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        True if move is valid in every direction, false if move is illegal.

      • isParallel

        public boolean isParallel()
        Returns:
        True if piece moves along the grid, false otherwise.

      • isDiagonal

        public boolean isDiagonal()
        Returns:
        True if piece moves diagonally, false otherwise.

      • isKnightly

        public boolean isKnightly()
        Returns:
        True if valid moves are knight, false otherwise.

      • isRegal

        public boolean isRegal()
        Returns:
        True if piece moves in all directions 1 step, false otherwise. (King)

      • isCastlingKS

        public boolean isCastlingKS(boolean isWhite)
        Parameters:
        isWhite - Color of the piece.
        Returns:
        True if the King's side castling move is valid, false otherwise.

        Returns:
